organisation_name: Air Conditioning and Refrigeration Industry Board (ACRIB)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
reciprocal membership with European Partnership for Energy and the Environment 
 
ACRIB is an association formed of a number of UK organisations including Institute of Refrigeration, Federation of Environmental Trade Associations, Building and Engineering Services, Chartered Institution of Building Services Engineers, Associated Refrigeration Contractors, Cambridge Refrigeration Technology, Food Storage and Distribution Federation, Association of Manufacturers of Domestic Equipment
goals__remit: Represent the views of trade associations and professional bodies involved in stationary refrigeration, air conditioning and heat pump industries in the UK
